name: Pie Taker
description:
Pie taker is a cooperative party game where up to 4 players play as Bodyguards with the goal to protect a VIP.  Escort them along different crowded events in order to assure their safety! Will you be able to save their face from the pie's cream? ► A cartoon design that will add life to your game session ► A chaotic environment that will bring fun to your group of friends
► An unique mechanic of Plunging that will make you feel like a strong bodyguard ► Play as a strong bodyguard, with the task to protect their VIP ► Run, plunge, do all in your power to stop the enemies and their pies ► Push away the pesky crowd wanting to bother your VIP ► Your pay depend of how you interact with your VIP, don't stay too close or face the consequences ► One tutorial to introduce you to the game ► 10 minutes minimum of gameplay, with 2 to 4 players
